translated: It radiates outward like the light of the sun.

original: de nas shar lho'i cha la yi ge dz'a kha dog dkar po 'od @8a * //
analyzed: de nas shar lho'i cha la yi ge dz'a kha dog dkar po 'od @8a * //
translated: Then, in the southeast, there is the white letter ja,

original: zer gyi phreng ba can no //
analyzed: zer gyi phreng ba can no //
translated: which has a garland of light rays.

analyzed: lho nub kyi cha la yi ge sa kha dog sngon po 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no // nub byang gi cha la yi ge dza kha dog dmar po 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no //
translated: In the southwest, there is the blue letter sa, which has a garland of light rays.🔽In the northwest, there is the red letter ja, which has a garland of light rays.

analyzed: byang shar kyi cha la yi ge ru kha dog ljang gu 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no //
translated: In the northeast, there is the green letter ru, which has a garland of light rays.

analyzed: de'i phyi rol gyi grva rnams la // shar lhor yi ge na kha dog dkar po 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no //
translated: Outside of that, in the corners,🔽in the southeast, there is the white letter na, which has a garland of light rays.

original: lho nub tu yi ge yo kha dog mthing ga 'od zer kyi phreng ba can no //🔽nub byang du yi ge ni kha dog dmar po 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no //
analyzed: lho nub tu yi ge yo kha dog mthing ga 'od zer kyi phreng ba can no // nub byang du yi ge ni kha dog dmar po 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no //
translated: In the southwest, there is the blue letter yo, which has a garland of light rays.🔽In the northwest, there is the red letter ni, which has a garland of light rays.

original: byang shar du yi ge r'a kha dog ljang gu 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no ;
analyzed: byang shar du yi ge r'a kha dog ljang gu 'od zer gyi phreng ba can no ;
translated: In the northeast, there is the green letter ra, which has a garland of light rays.

original: /'od zer gyi phreng ba brgyad po de dag kyang /
analyzed: /'od zer gyi phreng ba brgyad po de dag kyang /
translated: Those eight garlands of light rays

original: dang po rang rang 'dra ba'i 'od zer las phyi rol zla ba'i 'od zer lta bur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: dang po rang rang 'dra ba'i 'od zer las phyi rol zla ba'i 'od zer lta bur gyur pa'o //
translated: are, first, light rays like one’s own, and then outside like moon light.

original: shar gyi sgor yi ge ya kha dog dkar po //
analyzed: shar gyi sgor yi ge ya kha dog dkar po //
translated: At the eastern gate is the white letter ya.

original: lho phyogs kyi sgor yi ge tsa kha dog mthing ga / nub phyogs kyi sgor yi ge ni kha dog dmar po //
analyzed: lho phyogs kyi sgor yi ge tsa kha dog mthing ga / nub phyogs kyi sgor yi ge ni kha dog dmar po //
translated: At the southern gate is the blue letter ca, at the western gate the red letter ṇa,

original: byang phyogs kyi sgor yi ge r'a kha dog ljang gu de dag kyang 'od zer phreng ba can sha stag ste /
analyzed: byang phyogs kyi sgor yi ge r'a kha dog ljang gu de dag kyang 'od zer phreng ba can sha stag ste /
translated: and at the northern gate the green letter ra. They are all garlands of light rays.

original: 'od zer gyi phreng ba de dag kyang dang po rang rang gi 'od zer las phyi rol me'i 'od lta bur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: 'od zer gyi phreng ba de dag kyang dang po rang rang gi 'od zer las phyi rol me'i 'od lta bur gyur pa'o //
translated: Those garlands of light rays are, first, light rays like one’s own, and then outside like fire light.

original: de ltar ji ltar nus pa zhig bsam par byas nas //
analyzed: de ltar ji ltar nus pa zhig bsam par byas nas //
translated: Having visualized that as much as possible,

original: de nas yi ge ya la dmigs te /
analyzed: de nas yi ge ya la dmigs te /
translated: then focus on the letter ya.

original: aom badzra ya m'a ri zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
analyzed: aom badzra ya m'a ri zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
translated: By inciting it with the secret mantra oṃ vajra ya māri,

original: ya las ya'i 'od zer byung nas /
analyzed: ya las ya'i 'od zer byung nas /
translated: light rays arise from ya.

original: nam mkha'i khams thams cad du gang bar gyur to //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams thams cad du gang bar gyur to //
translated: They fill the whole realm of space.

original: yi ge de dag bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po'i sku sha stag tu gyur te nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang bar bsam mo //
analyzed: yi ge de dag bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po'i sku sha stag tu gyur te nam mkha'i khams yongs su gang bar bsam mo //
translated: Those syllables become the body of Bhagavat Yamântaka, and one should imagine that they fill the realm of space.

original: de nas sku de dag thams cad 'od du gyur pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi rang bzhin chos 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya shel lta bur dkar zhing dangs pa gru gsum pa gyen du gnas pa /
analyzed: de nas sku de dag thams cad 'od du gyur pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi rang bzhin chos 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya shel lta bur dkar zhing dangs pa gru gsum pa gyen du gnas pa /
translated: Then, all of those bodies become light, and from that, the seal called the source of phenomena, the nature of the abode of all tathāgatas, becomes a crystal-like white triangle standing upright,

original: nang padma dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa zhig tu gyur par bya'o //
analyzed: nang padma dang sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa zhig tu gyur par bya'o //
translated: marked with a lotus and a vajra cross, and equal to the realm of space.

original: sna tshogs rdo rje las kyang ye shes kyi rlung gi phung po chen por gyur te /
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje las kyang ye shes kyi rlung gi phung po chen por gyur te /
translated: And from the vajra cross, a great mass of wisdom wind arises,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brtan par nus so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brtan par nus so //
translated: and is able to stabilize the buddhafield.

original: de nas yi ge kshe la dmigs te /
analyzed: de nas yi ge kshe la dmigs te /
translated: Then, focusing on the syllable kṣe,

original: aom badzra kshe tra zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
analyzed: aom badzra kshe tra zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
translated: one should recite the secret mantra called “vajra site,”

original: kshe las kshe 'i 'od zer @8b byung nas chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya thams cad gang bar byas te /
analyzed: kshe las kshe 'i 'od zer @8b byung nas chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya thams cad gang bar byas te /
translated: From kṣe, light rays of kṣe emerge and fill all the seals of the source of phenomena.

original: yi ge de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku sha stag tu gyur nas /
analyzed: yi ge de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku sha stag tu gyur nas /
translated: Those syllables all transform into the body of the Bhagavat Vairocana.

original: chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yongs su gang bar byas so //
analyzed: chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yongs su gang bar byas so //
translated: The seals of the source of phenomena are completely filled.

original: de nas sku de dag kyang 'od du zhu bar gyur pa las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che padma 'dab ma dang ge sar dang snying por bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du bsam par bya'o
analyzed: de nas sku de dag kyang 'od du zhu bar gyur pa las bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che padma 'dab ma dang ge sar dang snying por bcas pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du bsam par bya'o
translated: Then those bodies melt into light and from within the great ocean of elixir, a precious lotus with petals, stamens, and a center arises, which is the pure buddha field, imagined as the characteristic of form.

original: // de nas yi ge ma la dmigs te /
analyzed: // de nas yi ge ma la dmigs te /
translated: Then focus on the syllable ma.

original: aom badzra ma h'i ndri zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
analyzed: aom badzra ma h'i ndri zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
translated: By the urging of the secret mantra oṃ vajra mahīndra,

original: ma las ma'i 'od zer byung bas padma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ster thams cad yongs su gang bar byas so //
analyzed: ma las ma'i 'od zer byung bas padma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ster thams cad yongs su gang bar byas so //
translated: from ma, light rays of ma emerge and fill all the lotus maṇḍalas.

original: de nas yi ge de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ba'i sku sha stag tu gyur nas padma'i snying po la 'dus par gyur pas 'og tu zhu bar gyur nas /
analyzed: de nas yi ge de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ba'i sku sha stag tu gyur nas padma'i snying po la 'dus par gyur pas 'og tu zhu bar gyur nas /
translated: Then those letters transform into the body of the Blessed One Ratnasaṃbhava alone, and they gather into the center of the lotus.

original: rin po che gser gyi rang bzhin du kun nas 'khrigs par gyur par bya'o //
analyzed: rin po che gser gyi rang bzhin du kun nas 'khrigs par gyur par bya'o //
translated: They melt and become a mass of gold.

original: de nas yi ge me la dmigs te /
analyzed: de nas yi ge me la dmigs te /
translated: Then visualize the letter raṃ.

original: aom badzra me ru zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bskul bas /
analyzed: aom badzra me ru zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis bskul bas /
translated: By inciting it with the mantra oṃ vajra jvāla,

original: me las me'i 'od zer byung nas padma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yongs su gang bar byas so //🔽de nas yi ge de dag bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi sku sha stag tu gyur te padma'i snying po gser gyi rang bzhin gyi gzhi la 'dus par gyur pas 'od du gyur nas rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'i ri'i rgyal po lhun po rab
analyzed: me las me'i 'od zer byung nas padma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yongs su gang bar byas so // de nas yi ge de dag bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi sku sha stag tu gyur te padma'i snying po gser gyi rang bzhin gyi gzhi la 'dus par gyur pas 'od du gyur nas rin po che sna bzhi las grub pa'i ri'i rgyal po lhun po rab
translated: fire light arises from the fire and fills the space above the lotus maṇḍala.🔽Then those letters transform into the body of the Blessed One Amitābha alone, and they gather into the center of the lotus, which is the basis of gold.

original: tu brtan par gyur par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: tu brtan par gyur par bsam par bya'o //
translated: They melt and become the king of mountains, Meru, which is firm and made of the four kinds of jewels.

original: de nas yi ge da la dmigs te /
analyzed: de nas yi ge da la dmigs te /
translated: Then visualize the letter khaṃ.

original: aom badzra da na zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
analyzed: aom badzra da na zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
translated: The mantra Oṃ vajra-dhā is uttered.

original: da las da'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs kun du gang bar byas so //
analyzed: da las da'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs kun du gang bar byas so //
translated: From the syllable dha, the light of dha arises and fills all directions.🔽Then those syllables all become the body of the Blessed Amoghasiddhi.

original: de nas yi ge de dag bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa'i sku sha stag tu gyur te de dag ri rab kyi rtse mor 'dus pa las /
analyzed: de nas yi ge de dag bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa'i sku sha stag tu gyur te de dag ri rab kyi rtse mor 'dus pa las /
translated: They gather on the peak of Mount Meru,

original: 'od du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi longs spyod sna tshogs kyi gzhir gyur pa ni 'di lta ste dpag bsam gyi shing dang / ljon pa'i shing dang / me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / spos kyi shing dag kyang kha dog dang dbyibs dang gnas pas khyad par du byas pa'o //
analyzed: 'od du gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi longs spyod sna tshogs kyi gzhir gyur pa ni 'di lta ste dpag bsam gyi shing dang / ljon pa'i shing dang / me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / spos kyi shing dag kyang kha dog dang dbyibs dang gnas pas khyad par du byas pa'o //
translated: become light, and become the basis for the various enjoyments of the buddha field, namely wish-fulfilling trees, fruit trees, flower trees, and trees of incense, distinguished by color, shape, and location.

original: gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bee d'urya @9a * //
analyzed: gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bee d'urya @9a * //
translated: Various jewels such as gold, silver, crystal, and lapis lazuli

original: la sogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyang kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / reg bya dang gnas pas khyad par du byas pa'o //
analyzed: la sogs pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyang kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / reg bya dang gnas pas khyad par du byas pa'o //
translated: are distinguished by color, shape, touch, and location.

original: bdud rtsi'i chu dang / btu nga ba'i chu dang / khrus kyi chu dag kyang kha dog dang dbyibs dang dri dang ro dang yan lag dang gnas pas khyad par du byas pa'o //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i chu dang / btu nga ba'i chu dang / khrus kyi chu dag kyang kha dog dang dbyibs dang dri dang ro dang yan lag dang gnas pas khyad par du byas pa'o //
translated: The water of nectar, the water for sprinkling, and the water for bathing are distinguished by their color, shape, smell, taste, parts, and location.

original: gos dang rgyan dang / bza' ba'i bye brag dag kyang de bzhin du yon tan gyis khyad par du byas pa ste /
analyzed: gos dang rgyan dang / bza' ba'i bye brag dag kyang de bzhin du yon tan gyis khyad par du byas pa ste /
translated: The various garments and ornaments, and the various foods, are also distinguished by their qualities.

original: de lta bu la sogs pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bu la sogs pa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par bsam par bya'o //
translated: You should imagine that they have inconceivable qualities such as these.

original: de nas yi ge dza la dmigs te /
analyzed: de nas yi ge dza la dmigs te /
translated: Then, focusing on the syllable ja,

original: aom badzra dz'a gaddha ra zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
analyzed: aom badzra dz'a gaddha ra zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
translated: you should recite the secret mantra, “Oṃ vajra jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.”

original: dza las dza'i 'od zer byung ste /
analyzed: dza las dza'i 'od zer byung ste /
translated: From jaḥ, jaḥ light rays emerge

original: phyogs kun du gang bar byas nas de dag kyang sangs rgyas spyan gyi sku sha stag tu gyur te slar 'dus nas 'od du gyur pa las gzhal med khang gi gzhir gyur pa ni /
analyzed: phyogs kun du gang bar byas nas de dag kyang sangs rgyas spyan gyi sku sha stag tu gyur te slar 'dus nas 'od du gyur pa las gzhal med khang gi gzhir gyur pa ni /
translated: and fill all directions. They all become the bodies of Buddhalocanā. They gather back together and transform into light, which becomes the ground of the celestial mansion.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: gzhi sna tshogs rdo rje las grub cing ;
analyzed: gzhi sna tshogs rdo rje las grub cing ;
translated: The ground is made of a vajra cross.

original: phyogs kun du yang sna tshogs rdo rje ra ba dang / dra ba 'ang 'khrigs par gyur pa de'i nang du /
analyzed: phyogs kun du yang sna tshogs rdo rje ra ba dang / dra ba 'ang 'khrigs par gyur pa de'i nang du /
translated: All around, it is a vajra ground and a vajra fence, and a vajra tent is spread above.

original: rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las grub pa'i gzhal med khang gi gzhi grub par bsam mo //
analyzed: rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las grub pa'i gzhal med khang gi gzhi grub par bsam mo //
translated: In the center of that, one should imagine that there is a ground made of the four precious substances.

original: de nas yi ge sa la dmigs te /
analyzed: de nas yi ge sa la dmigs te /
translated: Then, focusing on the syllable sa,

original: aom badzra sam ha ra ni zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags gyis bskul bas /
analyzed: aom badzra sam ha ra ni zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags gyis bskul bas /
translated: one should recite the mantra Oṃ vajra samharaṇa.

original: sa las sa'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs kun gang bar byas te /
analyzed: sa las sa'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs kun gang bar byas te /
translated: From the sa, light rays of earth emerge and fill all directions.

original: de dag kyang m'a ma k'i'i sku sha stag tu gyur nas slar 'dus te 'od du gyur pa las gzhal yas khang gi bla gab tu gyur pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de dag kyang m'a ma k'i'i sku sha stag tu gyur nas slar 'dus te 'od du gyur pa las gzhal yas khang gi bla gab tu gyur pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: They all become the form of Māmakī, and then they reabsorb and transform into light, which becomes the roof of the celestial mansion.

original: rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdung dang / phya ma chen dang / phya ma dgu po dang / phya ma phran dang / lan kan gyi dra ba dang / rten ma dang / gzer mig la sogs pas spras pa'i dbus na gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnas pa /
analyzed: rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdung dang / phya ma chen dang / phya ma dgu po dang / phya ma phran dang / lan kan gyi dra ba dang / rten ma dang / gzer mig la sogs pas spras pa'i dbus na gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnas pa /
translated: In the center is a golden wheel with a thousand spokes,

original: phyi rol rdo rje gur gyis yongs su 'khrigs par gtams pa'o //
analyzed: phyi rol rdo rje gur gyis yongs su 'khrigs par gtams pa'o //
translated: surrounded by a fence of vajras and a canopy of vajras.

original: de nas yi ge do la dmigs te /
analyzed: de nas yi ge do la dmigs te /
translated: Then, focusing on the syllable do,

original: aom badzra do ra hi ta zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
analyzed: aom badzra do ra hi ta zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
translated: one is urged by the secret mantra that begins “Oṃ vajra do rāhi.”

original: do las do'i 'od zer byung nas /
analyzed: do las do'i 'od zer byung nas /
translated: From do, light rays emerge

original: phyogs kun du gang bar byas te /
analyzed: phyogs kun du gang bar byas te /
translated: and fill all directions.

original: de dag kyang na bza' dkar mo sha stag tu gyur nas /
analyzed: de dag kyang na bza' dkar mo sha stag tu gyur nas /
translated: They all become white-robed bodhisattvas,🔽who return and transform into light.

analyzed: slar 'dus te 'od du gyur pa las gzhal yas khang gi gdan du gyur pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The seats of the celestial palace are as follows:

original: padma dang / @9b nyi ma dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: padma dang / @9b nyi ma dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: a lotus, sun, and moon maṇḍala.

original: de nas yi ge ru la dmigs te /
analyzed: de nas yi ge ru la dmigs te /
translated: Then, focusing on the syllable ru,

original: aom badzra ru ni la zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
analyzed: aom badzra ru ni la zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
translated: By the urging of the secret mantra, Oṃ vajra runi,

original: ru las ru'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs kun du gang bar byas te /
analyzed: ru las ru'i 'od zer byung nas phyogs kun du gang bar byas te /
translated: the light rays of ru arise from ru and fill all directions.

original: de dag kyang sgrol ma'i sku sha stag tu gyur nas slar 'dus te 'od du gyur pa las gzhal yas khang gi rnam par gyur pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de dag kyang sgrol ma'i sku sha stag tu gyur nas slar 'dus te 'od du gyur pa las gzhal yas khang gi rnam par gyur pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: Those also become the body of Tārā, and they again gather and become light. From that, the form of the celestial mansion arises.

analyzed: phyogs mtshams rnams su rin po che snang bar gyur te shin tu 'od gsal bar gyur pa'o //
translated: In the intermediate directions, the jewels appear and become very radiant.

original: rin po che snang ba de dag kyang gzhi rten pa med cing 'od sgrib pa dang chod pa med de /
analyzed: rin po che snang ba de dag kyang gzhi rten pa med cing 'od sgrib pa dang chod pa med de /
translated: Those appearing jewels are without a basis and without obstructing or obscuring light.

original: 'dod dgur 'phrul ba snang ba sha stag go //
analyzed: 'dod dgur 'phrul ba snang ba sha stag go //
translated: They are only the appearances of emanations of whatever is desired.

original: de nas yi ge ya la dmigs te /
analyzed: de nas yi ge ya la dmigs te /
translated: Then visualize the syllable ya.

original: aom badzra ya ma zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
analyzed: aom badzra ya ma zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bas /
translated: By the urging of the secret mantra, Oṃ vajra yama,

original: ya las ya'i 'od zer byung nas shar phyogs su 'phros te de dag kyang gshin rje mthar byed kyi sku sha stag tu gyur nas shar phyogs kyi sgor 'dus te 'od du gyur nas shar phyogs kyi sgo phun sum tshogs par gyur pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: ya las ya'i 'od zer byung nas shar phyogs su 'phros te de dag kyang gshin rje mthar byed kyi sku sha stag tu gyur nas shar phyogs kyi sgor 'dus te 'od du gyur nas shar phyogs kyi sgo phun sum tshogs par gyur pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: From ya, ya light rays come out and shine to the east, and they all become the bodies of Yamantaka. They gather at the eastern gate and become light, and the eastern gate becomes perfect.

original: sgo de yang sgo khang dang bcas pa /
analyzed: sgo de yang sgo khang dang bcas pa /
translated: That gate has a gate house,

original: sgo glegs dang / them skas dang rta babs dang bcas pa /
analyzed: sgo glegs dang / them skas dang rta babs dang bcas pa /
translated: gate panels, a threshold, stairs, and a portico.

analyzed: de nas gro ga 'am /

analyzed: aa dmar pos @17b mtshan pa kha dog dmar po zhig bya'o //

analyzed: de nas tshon sna lnga 'am //

analyzed: de ltar sbyor ba 'di zhag gcig gam gnyis sam gsum du byas nas /
translated: This procedure should be performed for one, two, or three days.

original: de nas sgrub pa pos dgug pa'i sbyor ba ji ltar nus pa byas te /
analyzed: de nas sgrub pa pos dgug pa'i sbyor ba ji ltar nus pa byas te /
translated: Then, the practitioner should perform the rite of summoning to the best of his ability.

original: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dag gis lha'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas lha'i cha lugs bzung ste /
analyzed: sgrub pa'i grogs mchog dag gis lha'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas lha'i cha lugs bzung ste /
translated: With the supreme companions of practice, endowed with divine meditative concentration, one should assume the divine attire.

original: bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan blangs la rang gi gnas su 'ong bar bya'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan blangs la rang gi gnas su 'ong bar bya'o //
translated: Having taken the effigy of the victim, one should bring it to one’s own abode.

original: de nas stegs bu'i steng du btsag gam rdo rgyus sam sol ba dag gis rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam bsgrub bya'i phyogs su blta ba zhags pa dang lcags kyu mang pos mtshan pa zhig bris la //
analyzed: de nas stegs bu'i steng du btsag gam rdo rgyus sam sol ba dag gis rlung gi dkyil 'khor zla gam bsgrub bya'i phyogs su blta ba zhags pa dang lcags kyu mang pos mtshan pa zhig bris la //
translated: Then, on top of the altar, with red chalk, red ocher, or charcoal, one should draw a crescent-shaped wind maṇḍala facing the direction of the victim, marked with many nooses and hooks.

original: de'i steng du bzhag la zhag bdun gyi bar du dgug pa'i sbyor ba bya zhing gzugs brnyan la bstims te /
analyzed: de'i steng du bzhag la zhag bdun gyi bar du dgug pa'i sbyor ba bya zhing gzugs brnyan la bstims te /
translated: Having placed the effigy on top of that, one should perform the practice of summoning for seven days, dissolving into the effigy.

original: skud pa nag po la rang gi gsang sngags bzlas pas shin tu bsdams par bsam zhing /
analyzed: skud pa nag po la rang gi gsang sngags bzlas pas shin tu bsdams par bsam zhing /
translated: One should imagine that one is very tightly bound with a black thread, reciting one’s secret mantra.

original: tshon skud lag pas bzung ste bzlas pa la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: tshon skud lag pas bzung ste bzlas pa la brtson par bya'o //
translated: Holding the thread in one’s hand, one should exert oneself in the recitation.

original: de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang rgya mtsho'i sa 'am //
analyzed: de nas zhag bdun lon pa dang rgya mtsho'i sa 'am //
translated: Then, when seven days have passed, one should take some mud from the ocean shore

original: de bzhin du chu chen po'i 'gram dang // lteng ka dang rdzing chen po dang // chu mig sna tshogs nas sa dang chu blangs te /🔽de nas sa de dag dang / sman dang spos dang / me tog bzang po dag dang legs par btags te 'bras @18a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du chu chen po'i 'gram dang // lteng ka dang rdzing chen po dang // chu mig sna tshogs nas sa dang chu blangs te / de nas sa de dag dang / sman dang spos dang / me tog bzang po dag dang legs par btags te 'bras @18a * //
translated: Likewise, from the bank of a great river, from a pond, from a great pool, and from various springs, take earth and water.

original: sam gro'i phye ma dag dang yang sbyar nas klu chen po'i gzugs byas nas /
analyzed: sam gro'i phye ma dag dang yang sbyar nas klu chen po'i gzugs byas nas /
translated: Then, having well mixed those earths with herbs, incense, and good flowers, and also with rice and sesame flour, make the form of a great nāga.

original: 'di ltar sprul rab tu 'bar ba'i kha gdangs pa bzhi byas te /
analyzed: 'di ltar sprul rab tu 'bar ba'i kha gdangs pa bzhi byas te /
translated: Thus, having made four blazing serpents with open mouths,

original: de dag gi snying gar aom phu zhes bya ba'i snying po bris la gzhug go //
analyzed: de dag gi snying gar aom phu zhes bya ba'i snying po bris la gzhug go //
translated: write the essence mantra oṃ phaṭ in their hearts and insert them.🔽Write kṣa in their mouths and insert them.

original: khar kham nag po bris la gzhug / sprul de dag kyang gtsug na nor bu yod pa lce gnyis pa so phreng ba 'dra bar gnas pa'o //
analyzed: khar kham nag po bris la gzhug / sprul de dag kyang gtsug na nor bu yod pa lce gnyis pa so phreng ba 'dra bar gnas pa'o //
translated: Those serpents also have a crest jewel, have two tongues, and have teeth like a row of fangs.

original: kha dog ni dang por gu gul dkar po dang ba'i mar bsres te bskol nas byug par bya'o //
analyzed: kha dog ni dang por gu gul dkar po dang ba'i mar bsres te bskol nas byug par bya'o //
translated: First, one should anoint with bdellium and clarified butter mixed with white mustard seed.

original: de nas tshon sna bzhis kha dog bsgyur bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas tshon sna bzhis kha dog bsgyur bar bya ste /
translated: Then, one should change the color with the four colors.

original: gcig ni dkar po'o //🔽gcig ni ser po'o //
analyzed: gcig ni dkar po'o // gcig ni ser po'o //
translated: One is white.🔽One is yellow.

original: gcig ni dmar po'o //
analyzed: gcig ni dmar po'o //
translated: One is red.

original: gcig ni nag po'o //
analyzed: gcig ni nag po'o //
translated: One is black.

original: de dag gi lce gnyis gnyis po de dag kyang tshon skud legs par bsgril ba mtho re ba gnyis gnyis la /
analyzed: de dag gi lce gnyis gnyis po de dag kyang tshon skud legs par bsgril ba mtho re ba gnyis gnyis la /
translated: Those two tongues of each of them are well-twisted threads, two cubits high.🔽Recite the secret mantra:

original: aom pa na n'a ga bi sha kham /
analyzed: aom pa na n'a ga bi sha kham /
translated: Oṃ pananāgaviṣa kham.

original: zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags bzlas te rtsa ba sprul gyi khar bcug la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags bzlas te rtsa ba sprul gyi khar bcug la /
translated: Place it at the mouth of the root nāga.

original: dug 'bar ba'i lcer gyur par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: dug 'bar ba'i lcer gyur par bsam par bya'o //
translated: Imagine that the tongue becomes a blazing poison.

original: de nas sa phyogs gtsang ma zhig tu ras sam gos gtsang ma'i gur phub la /
analyzed: de nas sa phyogs gtsang ma zhig tu ras sam gos gtsang ma'i gur phub la /
translated: Then, in a clean place, set up a tent of clean cloth or garment.

original: der mandala ba'i rnam lnga dang ldan pa zhig byas te /
analyzed: der mandala ba'i rnam lnga dang ldan pa zhig byas te /
translated: There, make a maṇḍala endowed with the five offerings.

original: der padma 'dab ma bzhi pa zhig bris nas ge sar sngon por byas nas de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po nyid khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs su gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: der padma 'dab ma bzhi pa zhig bris nas ge sar sngon por byas nas de'i steng du bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed po nyid khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i gzugs su gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Having drawn a four-petaled lotus there, make the stamen blue, and on top of that, place Bhagavat Yamāntaka himself in the form of Trailokyavijaya.

original: shar phyogs kyi 'dab ma dkar por bya ste /
analyzed: shar phyogs kyi 'dab ma dkar por bya ste /
translated: Make the eastern petal white,

original: der sprul dkar bo gzhag go //
analyzed: der sprul dkar bo gzhag go //
translated: and place a white snake there.

original: de bzhin du lho ser por bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du lho ser por bya ste /
translated: Likewise, the south should be yellow,

original: sbrul ser po gzhag go //
analyzed: sbrul ser po gzhag go //
translated: and a yellow snake should be placed there.

original: nub kyi dmar por bya ste sbrul dmar po gzhag go //
analyzed: nub kyi dmar por bya ste sbrul dmar po gzhag go //
translated: The west should be red, and a red snake should be placed there.

original: byang gi nag por byas te sbrul nag po gzhag go //
analyzed: byang gi nag por byas te sbrul nag po gzhag go //
translated: The north should be black, and a black snake should be placed there.

original: sbrul de dag kyang mgo dbus su blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: sbrul de dag kyang mgo dbus su blta bar bya'o //
translated: Those snakes should have their heads facing the center.

original: de nas sngags pa bdag nyid khrus legs par byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos te lag pa dri bzang pos byugs nas nub phyogs kyi sgor 'dug ste /
analyzed: de nas sngags pa bdag nyid khrus legs par byas nas gos gtsang ma bgos te lag pa dri bzang pos byugs nas nub phyogs kyi sgor 'dug ste /
translated: Then the mantrin himself, having performed a good ablution, dressed in clean clothes, and anointed his hands with fragrant substances, should sit at the western door,

original: rang gi lha'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas /
analyzed: rang gi lha'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas /
translated: having entered into the samadhi of his deity.

original: mandala gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs te /
analyzed: mandala gyi dbus su bcom ldan 'das spyan drangs te /
translated: Having invited the Blessed One to the center of the mandala,

original: legs par bsams nas /
analyzed: legs par bsams nas /
translated: he should visualize him well.

original: aargha dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pas mnyes par bya'o //
analyzed: aargha dang me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pas mnyes par bya'o //
translated: He should please him with offerings of arghya, flowers, and so forth.

original: de nas sbrul chen po bzhi'i mdun du sa las byas pa'i snod gtsang ma bzhi'i nang du rgya mtsho'i chu la sogs pa chu sna tshogs dang / ba'i 'o ma @18b dang ; / me tog dring ba med pa rnams blugs te bzhag la /
analyzed: de nas sbrul chen po bzhi'i mdun du sa las byas pa'i snod gtsang ma bzhi'i nang du rgya mtsho'i chu la sogs pa chu sna tshogs dang / ba'i 'o ma @18b dang ; / me tog dring ba med pa rnams blugs te bzhag la /
translated: Then, in front of four large snakes, in four clean vessels made of earth, place various kinds of water, such as ocean water, and cow milk, and fresh flowers.

original: der chu'i ho ma byas te klu rnams tshim par bya'o //
analyzed: der chu'i ho ma byas te klu rnams tshim par bya'o //
translated: Having made the water homa, satisfy the nagas.

original: de la chu'i hom bya ba'i cho ga ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la chu'i hom bya ba'i cho ga ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The rite for making the water homa is as follows.

original: de lta bu'i chu'i gzhi bshams nas gzhan yang mchod pa'i rdzas su gyur pa /
analyzed: de lta bu'i chu'i gzhi bshams nas gzhan yang mchod pa'i rdzas su gyur pa /
translated: Having prepared the water base in that way, further, the offering substances are

original: ba las byung ba'i dkar gsum dang / mngar gsum dang / khre dkar po dang / til dkar po dang / 'bras dkar po la sogs pa 'bru kha dog dkar po sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / ga pur dang tsandan dkar po la sogs te spos dang sman sna tshogs dang /
analyzed: ba las byung ba'i dkar gsum dang / mngar gsum dang / khre dkar po dang / til dkar po dang / 'bras dkar po la sogs pa 'bru kha dog dkar po sna tshogs dang / rin po che sna tshogs dang / ga pur dang tsandan dkar po la sogs te spos dang sman sna tshogs dang /
translated: the three white foods that come from a cow, the three sweet substances, white barley, white sesame, white rice, and so on, various white grains, various jewels, camphor, white sandalwood, and so on, various incense and medicines,

original: gzhan yang chu dag dkar po la sogs pa de dag dang mthun pa'i rdzas ji snyed pa dang / me tog dring ba med pa rnams dang / 'o ma dang 'bras chan dang / sha kha ra gsum du sbyar ba'i kha zas kyang gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang chu dag dkar po la sogs pa de dag dang mthun pa'i rdzas ji snyed pa dang / me tog dring ba med pa rnams dang / 'o ma dang 'bras chan dang / sha kha ra gsum du sbyar ba'i kha zas kyang gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Furthermore, one should set out as many substances as possible that are in accord with the pure water, the white, and so forth, and also the flowers without thorns, and the food of milk, rice, and the three sweets.

original: de nas sngags pa lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas snod kyi chu rnams kyi nang du yi ge pa las byung ba'i padma'i steng du /
analyzed: de nas sngags pa lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas snod kyi chu rnams kyi nang du yi ge pa las byung ba'i padma'i steng du /
translated: Then, the practitioner endowed with divine pride, in the water of the vessel, should visualize the syllable paṃ from which arises a lotus.🔽On that, he should visualize the syllable paṃ, the color of each deity.

original: yang yi ge pa rang rang gi kha dog can bsams pa las de yongs su gyur pa'i chu lha rang rang gi mdog can /
analyzed: yang yi ge pa rang rang gi kha dog can bsams pa las de yongs su gyur pa'i chu lha rang rang gi mdog can /
translated: From that, he should visualize the water deity, the color of each deity,

original: sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka dang ldan pa /
translated: having the hood of a snake,

original: lag na zhags pa dang autpala bsnams pa re re bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: lag na zhags pa dang autpala bsnams pa re re bsam par bya'o //
translated: holding a noose and an utpala flower in his hands.

original: de nas bdag gi snying ga nas so so'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i 'od zer 'phros pas /
analyzed: de nas bdag gi snying ga nas so so'i phyogs dang mthun pa'i 'od zer 'phros pas /
translated: Then, from his heart, he should visualize light rays radiating in accordance with each direction.

original: phyogs bzhi nas chu'i lha tshul snga ma dang mthun pa dag spyan drangs par bsam zhing /
analyzed: phyogs bzhi nas chu'i lha tshul snga ma dang mthun pa dag spyan drangs par bsam zhing /
translated: Imagine that from the four directions the water gods are invited in the same way as before.🔽Recite:

original: aom ba ru na de ba d'adta a'a karsha ya dza:h'um bam ho:/🔽zhes brjod nas /
analyzed: aom ba ru na de ba d'adta a'a karsha ya dza:h'um bam ho:/ zhes brjod nas /
translated: Oṃ varuṇadeva datta ākarṣaya jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.

original: mchod snod du me tog gtor nas /
analyzed: mchod snod du me tog gtor nas /
translated: Having scattered flowers into the offering vessel,

original: chu lha de dag sngar bsams pa'i chu lha dang gnyis su med par gyur nas 'o ma'i rgya mtsho'i nang du padma'i gdan la bzhugs par bsam mo //
analyzed: chu lha de dag sngar bsams pa'i chu lha dang gnyis su med par gyur nas 'o ma'i rgya mtsho'i nang du padma'i gdan la bzhugs par bsam mo //
translated: imagine that those water gods become nondual with the previously imagined water god and reside on a lotus seat in the middle of the milk ocean.

original: de nas dri bzang po'i spos rnams bsregs pa yang phyogs bzhir btang //
analyzed: de nas dri bzang po'i spos rnams bsregs pa yang phyogs bzhir btang //
translated: Then burn fragrant incense in the four directions.

original: ba'i mar sar las byas pa'i mar me yang phyogs bzhir bltams te /
analyzed: ba'i mar sar las byas pa'i mar me yang phyogs bzhir bltams te /
translated: Also light butter lamps made of ghee in the four directions.

original: tsandan dkar po dang sbyar ba'i dri chab kyang phyogs kun du gtor nas /
analyzed: tsandan dkar po dang sbyar ba'i dri chab kyang phyogs kun du gtor nas /
translated: Also sprinkle water mixed with white sandalwood in all directions.

original: de nas dang por me tog gtor te ;
analyzed: de nas dang por me tog gtor te ;
translated: Then first scatter flowers and

original: / aom ba ru na de ba d'a tt'a ya sv'a h'a /
analyzed: / aom ba ru na de ba d'a tt'a ya sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ varuṇadeva datta svāhā.

original: zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis phul bas /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis phul bas /
translated: Having offered with this secret mantra,

original: 'o ma'i rgya mtsho la me tog gi tshal chen po chags par bsam mo //
analyzed: 'o ma'i rgya mtsho la me tog gi tshal chen po chags par bsam mo //
translated: Imagine that a great forest of flowers grows in the ocean of milk.

original: gsang sngags de nyid kyis spos phul bas //
analyzed: gsang sngags de nyid kyis spos phul bas //
translated: By offering incense with the same mantra,

original: gnas der rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi sprin chags par bsam mo //🔽de nas gsang @19a * //
analyzed: gnas der rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi sprin chags par bsam mo // de nas gsang @19a * //
translated: imagine that a cloud of precious substances gathers in the sky.

original: sngags de nyid kyis phyugs la gtor te /
analyzed: sngags de nyid kyis phyugs la gtor te /
translated: Then, with the same mantra, make a torma offering to the animals.

original: sprin de las bdud rtsi'i char bab pas /
analyzed: sprin de las bdud rtsi'i char bab pas /
translated: Imagine that a rain of nectar falls from that cloud,

original: de dag shin tu dga' ba dang rangs pa skyes par bsam mo //
analyzed: de dag shin tu dga' ba dang rangs pa skyes par bsam mo //
translated: and that they become extremely happy and delighted.

original: de bzhin du mar me phul bas spyi bo la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'od 'bar ba gnas par gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du mar me phul bas spyi bo la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che 'od 'bar ba gnas par gyur te /
translated: In the same way, by offering lamps, imagine that a blazing wish-fulfilling jewel rests on the crown of their heads,

original: nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang bral bar bsam mo //
analyzed: nam mkha' lding gi 'jigs pa dang bral bar bsam mo //
translated: and that they are freed from the fear of the garuḍas.

original: de bzhin du dkar gsum dang / mngar gsum la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams la gsang sngags de nyid kyis phul bas /
analyzed: de bzhin du dkar gsum dang / mngar gsum la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams la gsang sngags de nyid kyis phul bas /
translated: In the same way, by offering the substances of the three whites, the three sweets, and so forth, with the same mantra,

original: rang rang gi rdzas dang mthun pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs su gyur te mnyes par gyur par bsam mo //
analyzed: rang rang gi rdzas dang mthun pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs su gyur te mnyes par gyur par bsam mo //
translated: imagine that they become a collection of desirable qualities that are in accordance with each one’s substance, and that they are pleased.

original: de nas me tog chu la gtor te /
analyzed: de nas me tog chu la gtor te /
translated: Then, scatter flowers in the water.

original: chu'i lha chen po khyod mkhyen par mdzod cig / chu thams cad khyed kyi rang bzhin lags te /
analyzed: chu'i lha chen po khyod mkhyen par mdzod cig / chu thams cad khyed kyi rang bzhin lags te /
translated: “Great water god, you should know that all water is of your nature.

original: bdag gis chu la ci mchod pa thams cad khyed kyi 'khor du bcas pa thams cad mnyes par gyur nas /
analyzed: bdag gis chu la ci mchod pa thams cad khyed kyi 'khor du bcas pa thams cad mnyes par gyur nas /
translated: Whatever I offer to the water, it should please all of your retinue.

original: bdag cag la yang dgyes shing dngos grub gsol bar mdzod cig ces brjod do //
analyzed: bdag cag la yang dgyes shing dngos grub gsol bar mdzod cig ces brjod do //
translated: Be pleased with us and grant spiritual powers.”

original: de nas yang rang gi snying ga nas ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bzhi nas klu'i tshogs bkug ste /
analyzed: de nas yang rang gi snying ga nas ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bzhi nas klu'i tshogs bkug ste /
translated: Then, light rays of awareness shine again from one’s heart, summoning the hosts of nāgas from the four directions.

original: de yang shar phyogs su rgyal po phru gu 'dra ba kha dog dkar po pho dang mo'i cha byad 'dzin pa mang po 'dus par 'gyur bar bsam mo //
analyzed: de yang shar phyogs su rgyal po phru gu 'dra ba kha dog dkar po pho dang mo'i cha byad 'dzin pa mang po 'dus par 'gyur bar bsam mo //
translated: In the east, imagine that many kings like children, white in color, and wearing male and female attire gather.

original: de bzhin du lho phyogs su ni kha dog ser skya bram ze'i cha byad can no //
analyzed: de bzhin du lho phyogs su ni kha dog ser skya bram ze'i cha byad can no //
translated: In the same way, in the south, they are pale yellow in color and wear the attire of brahmins.

original: nub phyogs su ni kha dog dmar skya byis pa gzhon nu'i cha byad can no //
analyzed: nub phyogs su ni kha dog dmar skya byis pa gzhon nu'i cha byad can no //
translated: In the west, they are pale red in color and wear the attire of young children.

original: byang phyogs su ni dud 'gro'i cha byad can de 'di ltar sprul nag po dang sbal ba nag po dang / glang nag po la sogs pa 'dus par bsam zhing /
analyzed: byang phyogs su ni dud 'gro'i cha byad can de 'di ltar sprul nag po dang sbal ba nag po dang / glang nag po la sogs pa 'dus par bsam zhing /
translated: Recite:

original: aom sarba pan n'a ga phu: phu: a'a karsha ya dza:h'um bam ho:/
analyzed: aom sarba pan n'a ga phu: phu: a'a karsha ya dza:h'um bam ho:/
translated: oṃ sarva-nāga pū pū ākarṣaya jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.

original: zhes brjod cing lag pa thal mo sbyar ba las gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng /
analyzed: zhes brjod cing lag pa thal mo sbyar ba las gung mo gnyis gshibs te bsgreng /
translated: With the palms joined, the two middle fingers are extended side by side.

original: lhag ma phyir bkyed de autpala ltar byas pa 'di ni klu thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
analyzed: lhag ma phyir bkyed de autpala ltar byas pa 'di ni klu thams cad dga' bar byed pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
translated: The remaining fingers are spread out like an utpala flower. This is the pledge seal that delights all nāgas.

original: 'dis spyan drangs pas phyogs bzhi'i 'o ma'i mtsho chen po bzhi'i nang du 'dus par bsam mo //
analyzed: 'dis spyan drangs pas phyogs bzhi'i 'o ma'i mtsho chen po bzhi'i nang du 'dus par bsam mo //
translated: Since they are invited with this, imagine that they gather in the four great milk oceans in the four directions.

original: de nas de dag chu lha dang rang bzhin gcig par yang gyur cing 'khor dang gtso bo'i tshul du 'dug par yang dmigs la /
analyzed: de nas de dag chu lha dang rang bzhin gcig par yang gyur cing 'khor dang gtso bo'i tshul du 'dug par yang dmigs la /
translated: Then, imagine that they become of one nature with the water deity and that they are present in the manner of retinue and principal.

original: dri chab kyis gtor te phyogs shin tu gtsang bar gyur par bsams la /
analyzed: dri chab kyis gtor te phyogs shin tu gtsang bar gyur par bsams la /
translated: Sprinkle them with scented water and imagine that the directions become very pure.

original: de nas chu lta @19b mchod pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mchod par bya zhing phyag rgya de nyid dang ldan pas /
analyzed: de nas chu lta @19b mchod pa'i rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du mchod par bya zhing phyag rgya de nyid dang ldan pas /
translated: Then, just as in the rite of the water worship, one should worship with that very consort.

original: aom sarba pan n'a ga phu: phu: sarba p'u dza me gha sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom sarba pan n'a ga phu: phu: sarba p'u dza me gha sa ma ye sv'a h'a /
translated: Reciting Oṃ sarvapāpaphūḥ phūḥ sarvapūjamekhasame svāhā,

original: zhes brjod cing sngon du brjod pa'i bsam rgyud dang ldan pas mnyes par 'gyur bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes brjod cing sngon du brjod pa'i bsam rgyud dang ldan pas mnyes par 'gyur bar bya'o //
translated: one should please with the previously mentioned mental continuum.

original: de nas gshegs su mi gsol bar /
analyzed: de nas gshegs su mi gsol bar /
translated: Then, without requesting them to depart,

original: de bzhin du zhag gsum mam lnga 'am bdun gyi bar du byas la /
analyzed: de bzhin du zhag gsum mam lnga 'am bdun gyi bar du byas la /
translated: one should do it in that way for three, five, or seven days.

original: de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog zhig gis sngon gyi rang gi gnas su song ste /
analyzed: de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog zhig gis sngon gyi rang gi gnas su song ste /
translated: Then, a supreme friend of practice should go to one's former abode

original: gro ga 'am shog bu la bsgrub bya'i ming rus bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: gro ga 'am shog bu la bsgrub bya'i ming rus bri bar bya'o //
translated: and write the name and clan of the victim on birch bark or paper.

original: 'di ltar yul che ge mo na gnas pa'i mi che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di /
analyzed: 'di ltar yul che ge mo na gnas pa'i mi che ge mo zhes bya ba 'di /
translated: It should be written, In such and such a place, the person named so and so

original: rang bzhin ngan pa bstan pa la gnod pa nga rgyal can zhig ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin ngan pa bstan pa la gnod pa nga rgyal can zhig ste /
translated: is evil by nature, harms the doctrine, and is arrogant.

original: sngon yang 'dis bdag cag la bar chad byas //
analyzed: sngon yang 'dis bdag cag la bar chad byas //
translated: In the past, he has created obstacles for us.

original: da ltar yang bdag cag klu chen po khyed rnams mchod pa la bar chad byed de /
analyzed: da ltar yang bdag cag klu chen po khyed rnams mchod pa la bar chad byed de /
translated: Now, you great nāgas, this one creates obstacles for our worship.

original: 'di ni bdag cag la brnyas par ma zad kyi //
analyzed: 'di ni bdag cag la brnyas par ma zad kyi //
translated: Not only does he despise us,

original: khyed cag lta bu mthu dang ldan pa rnams la yang brnyas par byed khyad du gsod par byed 'tshe bar byed pas /
analyzed: khyed cag lta bu mthu dang ldan pa rnams la yang brnyas par byed khyad du gsod par byed 'tshe bar byed pas /
translated: but he also despises, scorns, and harms those of you who possess power.🔽Therefore, it is fitting that this man be seized by you.

original: de bas na mi 'di khyed rnams kyis gzung bar rigs so zhes bya ba bris la zang sam lcags kyi sbu gu zhig la dril te skud pa nag pos dkris nas /
analyzed: de bas na mi 'di khyed rnams kyis gzung bar rigs so zhes bya ba bris la zang sam lcags kyi sbu gu zhig la dril te skud pa nag pos dkris nas /
translated: Having written this, roll it up in a black thread.

original: de nas gu gul nag po dang rgya skyegs su sbyar ba'i me la bzhu bas dril te /
analyzed: de nas gu gul nag po dang rgya skyegs su sbyar ba'i me la bzhu bas dril te /
translated: Then, melt it in a fire of black gugul and lac resin.

original: bsgrub bya'i tshon skud la gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i tshon skud la gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Then, insert it into the thread of the person to be subdued.

original: de nas gzugs brnyan de blangs nas klu mchod pa'i gnas su khyer te mandala gyi lho phyogs su bzhag nas /
analyzed: de nas gzugs brnyan de blangs nas klu mchod pa'i gnas su khyer te mandala gyi lho phyogs su bzhag nas /
translated: Then, having taken that image, carry it to a place where the nāgas are worshipped, and place it to the south of the maṇḍala.

original: sgrub pa po dang grogs mchog rnams kyis me tog mang po thogs te /
analyzed: sgrub pa po dang grogs mchog rnams kyis me tog mang po thogs te /
translated: Then, the adept and his best friends, holding many flowers,

original: mchod snod dang phyogs thams cad du gtor la thal mo sbyar te /
analyzed: mchod snod dang phyogs thams cad du gtor la thal mo sbyar te /
translated: Scatter the offering vessel and all directions with it, and join the palms together.

original: sngon du bris pa'i tshig snga ma de lan bdun nam //
analyzed: sngon du bris pa'i tshig snga ma de lan bdun nam //
translated: Recite the previously written words seven times,

original: nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bar du brjod par bya'o //
translated: or up to twenty-one times.

original: de nas chu de dag snod gtsang ma cig gi nang du bsdus la sbrul de rnams kyang rim pa bzhin du phyogs gcig nas bsdus nas /
analyzed: de nas chu de dag snod gtsang ma cig gi nang du bsdus la sbrul de rnams kyang rim pa bzhin du phyogs gcig nas bsdus nas /
translated: Then, collect that water in a clean vessel and also collect the snakes in order from one direction.

original: sbrul gyi lce'i tshon skud re re dang / bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i tshon skud re re kha dog mthun par sprel te de nas snod bzang po sbrul gyi gzugs brnyan chag par mi 'gyur ba zhig gi nang du bcug ste /
analyzed: sbrul gyi lce'i tshon skud re re dang / bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i tshon skud re re kha dog mthun par sprel te de nas snod bzang po sbrul gyi gzugs brnyan chag par mi 'gyur ba zhig gi nang du bcug ste /
translated: Pair each of the snake-tongue threads with each of the victim’s navel threads, matching the colors. Then, place them in a good vessel, in the form of a snake, which will not break.

original: klu chen po ma rungs pa zhig yod pa'i sa phyogs zhig tu khyer te dong khru gang tsam pa gnyis brus nas de'i bar yang 'brel mar brus te /
analyzed: klu chen po ma rungs pa zhig yod pa'i sa phyogs zhig tu khyer te dong khru gang tsam pa gnyis brus nas de'i bar yang 'brel mar brus te /
translated: Carry it to a place where there is a very bad great nāga, dig two pits one cubit deep, and connect them in between.

original: bsgrub bya'i ngos su bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan gzhag @20a * //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i ngos su bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan gzhag @20a * //
translated: Place the victim’s effigy on the side of the victim.

original: gcig tu sbrul gyi gzugs brnyan bcug ste /
analyzed: gcig tu sbrul gyi gzugs brnyan bcug ste /
translated: Place the image of the snake in one place.🔽Pour water into it, cover it well, and hide it.

original: der chu yang blugs te legs par kha bcad la sbas te gzhag / de nas de phan chad sa phyogs der song ste sbrul gyis phyogs kyi steng du snod gtsang ma'i nang du snga ma bzhin du chu'i hom byas te /
analyzed: der chu yang blugs te legs par kha bcad la sbas te gzhag / de nas de phan chad sa phyogs der song ste sbrul gyis phyogs kyi steng du snod gtsang ma'i nang du snga ma bzhin du chu'i hom byas te /
translated: Then, from that time on, go to that place and perform the homa of water in a clean vessel on top of the place of the snake, as before.

original: snga ma'i tshig gis de bzhin du bsgo ba byas nas klu rnams ni phra ma la dga' ba dang / sngon du 'dris pa gtsor byed pa yin pas bsgrub bya de dag klu rnams kyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snga ma'i tshig gis de bzhin du bsgo ba byas nas klu rnams ni phra ma la dga' ba dang / sngon du 'dris pa gtsor byed pa yin pas bsgrub bya de dag klu rnams kyis 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Having done that, as before, the nāgas will seize the victim, because the nāgas delight in slander and value their previous acquaintances.

original: de yang sgrub pa po rab rnams kyis ni rjes su bskul bas zhag bdun byas pas 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang sgrub pa po rab rnams kyis ni rjes su bskul bas zhag bdun byas pas 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, the best adepts will seize the victim in seven days by urging them.

original: tha ma rnams kyis kyang rjes su bskul ba zla ba drug byas pas 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha ma rnams kyis kyang rjes su bskul ba zla ba drug byas pas 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Even the worst adepts will seize the victim in six months by urging them.

original: sngon du gtang pa'i cho ga ni bye brag med do //
analyzed: sngon du gtang pa'i cho ga ni bye brag med do //
translated: There is no difference in the preliminary rite.

original: sbu gu rig par bya ba zhes bya ba'i cho ga las bsgrub bya klu'i gdon gyis zin par bya ba'i sbyor ba rdzogs so //
analyzed: sbu gu rig par bya ba zhes bya ba'i cho ga las bsgrub bya klu'i gdon gyis zin par bya ba'i sbyor ba rdzogs so //
translated: The procedure called “the tube-knowledge” is finished.

original: // da ni sbu gu rig par bya ba'i thabs kyi cho ga las /
analyzed: // da ni sbu gu rig par bya ba'i thabs kyi cho ga las /
translated: Now, from the procedure of the tube-knowledge,

original: bsgrub bya sa'i bdag pos zin par bya ba'i sbyor ba bshad de /
analyzed: bsgrub bya sa'i bdag pos zin par bya ba'i sbyor ba bshad de /
translated: the procedure for the possessed one to be seized by the lord of the earth is explained.

original: de la thog mar sngon du brjod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: de la thog mar sngon du brjod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan snga ma bzhin du bya'o //
translated: There, first, as before, one should make an effigy of the possessed one, endowed with the previously mentioned samādhi.

original: de las cung zad bye brag tu na bsgrub bya'i khang pa las sa blangs te /
analyzed: de las cung zad bye brag tu na bsgrub bya'i khang pa las sa blangs te /
translated: From that, a little different, one should take earth from the possessed one’s house,

original: grog mkhar gyi sa dang sa gzhan du yang sbyar nas //
analyzed: grog mkhar gyi sa dang sa gzhan du yang sbyar nas //
translated: and also mix it with anthill earth and other earth.

original: bsgrub bya'i khang pa'i gzugs brnyan sor bcu drug pa chu zheng gab pa zhig bya'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i khang pa'i gzugs brnyan sor bcu drug pa chu zheng gab pa zhig bya'o //
translated: One should make an effigy of the possessed one’s house, sixteen fingerbreadths wide and deep.

original: gzugs brnyan de gnyis ka la yang srog chags skye bas thob pa'i dgrar gyur pa rnams las mthu rtsal chung ba rnams kyi spu rnams ji ltar rnyed pa blangs te sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan de gnyis ka la yang srog chags skye bas thob pa'i dgrar gyur pa rnams las mthu rtsal chung ba rnams kyi spu rnams ji ltar rnyed pa blangs te sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The hairs of those who are weak in power and strength should be collected from both of these images of the target and applied.

original: de nas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan de'i snying gar bsgrub bya skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i ming dang rus dag bris te gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan de'i snying gar bsgrub bya skyes pa dang bud med dang khye'u dang bu mo la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i ming dang rus dag bris te gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Then, in the heart of the image of the target, one should insert the name and clan of the target, whether male or female, boy or girl, and so forth, together with their retinue.

original: de nas bsgrub bya de khang pa'i dkyil du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bsgrub bya de khang pa'i dkyil du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: Then, that target should be placed in the center of the house.

original: khang pa de yang glo skar bzhi dang bcas pa mda' yab dang bcas par bya'o //
analyzed: khang pa de yang glo skar bzhi dang bcas pa mda' yab dang bcas par bya'o //
translated: That house should have four corners and a parapet.

original: sgo ngos kyi glo skar gyi nang nas lte ba'i tshon skud drangs te /
analyzed: sgo ngos kyi glo skar gyi nang nas lte ba'i tshon skud drangs te /
translated: The central thread should be drawn from inside the corners of the door and the sides.

original: snga ma bzhin du rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du bzhag nas /
translated: As before, it should be placed on the wind maṇḍala.

original: bsgrub bya dgug pa'i sbyor ba yang nas yang du bya'o //
analyzed: bsgrub bya dgug pa'i sbyor ba yang nas yang du bya'o //
translated: The practice of summoning the target should be performed again and again.

original: de tshe sa'i bdag po ma rungs pa gnas pa'i gnas sna tshogs nas sa blangs la cha gsum du bcad de /
analyzed: de tshe sa'i bdag po ma rungs pa gnas pa'i gnas sna tshogs nas sa blangs la cha gsum du bcad de /
translated: Then, taking earth from various places where there are unwholesome lords of the land, divide it into three parts.

original: cha gcig dangs bzang po @20b gzhan du sbyar nas bum pa bzang po khru gang ba'i tshad tsam zhig bya'o //
analyzed: cha gcig dangs bzang po @20b gzhan du sbyar nas bum pa bzang po khru gang ba'i tshad tsam zhig bya'o //
translated: From one part, make a good mixture and with it make a good vase about one cubit in size.

original: cha gcig las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan khru gang gi tshad tsam zhig byas te /
analyzed: cha gcig las sdig pa'i gzugs brnyan khru gang gi tshad tsam zhig byas te /
translated: From the second part, make an effigy of a sinner about one cubit in size.

original: de yangs bzang po gzhan dang grog mkhar gyi dang yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de yangs bzang po gzhan dang grog mkhar gyi dang yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: Mix it with other good earth and with an anthill.

original: cha gcig las dum brug gsum du bgos te /
analyzed: cha gcig las dum brug gsum du bgos te /
translated: From the third part, make three pieces.

original: dum bu gcig las phag gi gzugs brnyan bya'o //
analyzed: dum bu gcig las phag gi gzugs brnyan bya'o //
translated: From one piece, make an effigy of a pig.

original: dum bu gcig las bud med skra lhug par bshig pa zhig gi gzugs brnyan bya'o //
analyzed: dum bu gcig las bud med skra lhug par bshig pa zhig gi gzugs brnyan bya'o //
translated: From the second piece, make an effigy of a woman with loose hair.

original: dum bu gcig ni sa nyid du gzhag go //
analyzed: dum bu gcig ni sa nyid du gzhag go //
translated: Leave the third piece as earth.

original: de la bum pa ni kha dog ser po bya'o //
analyzed: de la bum pa ni kha dog ser po bya'o //
translated: The vase should be yellow.

original: sdig pa ni nag po la sngon po'i thig le can du bya'o //
analyzed: sdig pa ni nag po la sngon po'i thig le can du bya'o //
translated: The sinner should be black with blue spots.

original: phag ni ser po la nag po'i thig le can du bya'o //
analyzed: phag ni ser po la nag po'i thig le can du bya'o //
translated: The pig should be yellow with black spots.

original: bud med ni ser po la sngon po'i thig le can du bya'o //
analyzed: bud med ni ser po la sngon po'i thig le can du bya'o //
translated: The female figure should be yellow with a blue drop.

original: de nas phag dang bud med kyi gzugs gnyis bum pa'i nang du gzhag go //
analyzed: de nas phag dang bud med kyi gzugs gnyis bum pa'i nang du gzhag go //
translated: Then place the two figures of the pig and the woman inside the vase.

original: gzugs brnyan gsum po de dag la yang srog chags skye bas thob pa dang nang mi mthun pa rnams las gnyen por gyur pa rnams kyi sbu ji ltar rnyed pa dang yang ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan gsum po de dag la yang srog chags skye bas thob pa dang nang mi mthun pa rnams las gnyen por gyur pa rnams kyi sbu ji ltar rnyed pa dang yang ldan par bya'o //
translated: And on those three images, you should also place the hairs of creatures obtained from birth and those that are antidotes to the discordant factors.

original: gzhan yang 'byung khungs sna tshogs pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'byung khungs sna tshogs pa 'di lta ste /
translated: Moreover, there are various sources, such as

original: gser gyi 'byung khungs kyis dang / gser dang de bzhin du dngul dang / zangs dang lcags la sogs pa rnams kyi 'byung khungs kyis dang / de dag gi rgyu rdo rje nyid dang / sngar gyi sa'i dum bu gcig bzhag pa rnams legs par btags te /
analyzed: gser gyi 'byung khungs kyis dang / gser dang de bzhin du dngul dang / zangs dang lcags la sogs pa rnams kyi 'byung khungs kyis dang / de dag gi rgyu rdo rje nyid dang / sngar gyi sa'i dum bu gcig bzhag pa rnams legs par btags te /
translated: the source of gold, and likewise the source of silver, copper, iron, and so on, the source of those, the vajra itself, and the previously placed pieces of earth.

original: de'i nang du byu ru dang shel dang dung la sogs te rin po che sna tshogs ji ltar rnyed pa dang sbyar nas bum pa'i nang du blugs par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i nang du byu ru dang shel dang dung la sogs te rin po che sna tshogs ji ltar rnyed pa dang sbyar nas bum pa'i nang du blugs par bya'o //
translated: In it, one should put various jewels such as coral, crystal, and conch, and whatever other jewels one can find.

original: de nas rang gi gnas nas mi mthong ba'i sa phyogs shig tu dong zhig brkos te /
analyzed: de nas rang gi gnas nas mi mthong ba'i sa phyogs shig tu dong zhig brkos te /
translated: Then, one should go to a place that is not visible from one’s dwelling and dig a hole.

original: der bum pa de bcug nas de'i mdun du sdig pa'i gzugs bzhag ste /
analyzed: der bum pa de bcug nas de'i mdun du sdig pa'i gzugs bzhag ste /
translated: Having placed the vase there, one should set up an image of a sinner in front of it.

original: bum pa dang mnyam pa tsam du de kha gcad par bya'o //
analyzed: bum pa dang mnyam pa tsam du de kha gcad par bya'o //
translated: It should be covered up to the same height as the vase.

original: de'i steng du mandala padma dang 'dra ba byas nas /
analyzed: de'i steng du mandala padma dang 'dra ba byas nas /
translated: On top of that, one should make a maṇḍala like a lotus.

original: dbus kyi snying po kha cung zad tsam phye ste /
analyzed: dbus kyi snying po kha cung zad tsam phye ste /
translated: The center should be slightly opened.

original: bum pa'i nang snang bar gyur pa tsam du bya'o //
analyzed: bum pa'i nang snang bar gyur pa tsam du bya'o //
translated: It should be made just large enough for the interior of the vase to be visible.

original: de'i steng du gur nag po zhig phub ste der 'dug nas /
analyzed: de'i steng du gur nag po zhig phub ste der 'dug nas /
translated: On top of that, one should set up a black tent and stay there.

original: sa'i hom gyi sa'i bdag po rnams tshim par bya'o //
analyzed: sa'i hom gyi sa'i bdag po rnams tshim par bya'o //
translated: One should satisfy the lords of the earth with the pṛthivī homa.

original: de'i cho ga 'di yin te /
analyzed: de'i cho ga 'di yin te /
translated: This is the rite:

original: mchod pa'i rdzas sngon du brjod pa rnams dang / khyad par du yang rin po che'i sna tshogs 'byung khungs kyi rdo rnams dang sbyar ba dang / 'bru sna tshogs dang gos kha dog mi mthun pa sna tshogs pa bsag par bya'o //
analyzed: mchod pa'i rdzas sngon du brjod pa rnams dang / khyad par du yang rin po che'i sna tshogs 'byung khungs kyi rdo rnams dang sbyar ba dang / 'bru sna tshogs dang gos kha dog mi mthun pa sna tshogs pa bsag par bya'o //
translated: The materials for the offerings mentioned previously and, in particular, various jewels, mines of jewels, various grains, and various differently colored cloths should be collected.

original: de nas sngags ba bdag nyid shar phyogs su 'dug ste /🔽dri sna tshogs @21a * //
analyzed: de nas sngags ba bdag nyid shar phyogs su 'dug ste / dri sna tshogs @21a * //
translated: Then the mantrin himself should sit facing east,

original: kyis lag pa byugs /
analyzed: kyis lag pa byugs /
translated: anoint his hands with various fragrances,

original: kha dog sna tshogs kyi gos gyon nas rang gi lha'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: kha dog sna tshogs kyi gos gyon nas rang gi lha'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom par bya'o //
translated: and dress in variously colored clothes, and meditate on the meditative stabilization of his deity.

original: de nas bum pa'i nang du yi ge ba kha dog ser po zhig las sa'i bdag po phag chen po zhes bya ba phag ser khra la zhon pa /
analyzed: de nas bum pa'i nang du yi ge ba kha dog ser po zhig las sa'i bdag po phag chen po zhes bya ba phag ser khra la zhon pa /
translated: Then, in the vase, from a yellow syllable vaṃ, imagine a lord of the earth, a great pig, mounted on a yellow pig,

original: kha dog ser khra phag gi mgo can lag na lcags kyu dang phag gi mche ba thogs pa bsam mo //
analyzed: kha dog ser khra phag gi mgo can lag na lcags kyu dang phag gi mche ba thogs pa bsam mo //
translated: yellow-tinged, with a pig's head, holding an iron hook and a pig's tusk.

original: de'i g-yon ngos su yang sa'i bdag mo padma li zhes bya ba /
analyzed: de'i g-yon ngos su yang sa'i bdag mo padma li zhes bya ba /
translated: On his left side is also a lady of the earth, Padmalī by name,

original: mdog dmar ser la ris bkra ba lag na gser gyi bum pa thogs pa zhig bsam mo //
analyzed: mdog dmar ser la ris bkra ba lag na gser gyi bum pa thogs pa zhig bsam mo //
translated: Imagine that he is reddish-yellow in color, has a variegated appearance, and holds a golden vase in his hand.

original: de dag gi mdun du dus thams cad kyi srung ma britstshi ka zhes bya ba /
analyzed: de dag gi mdun du dus thams cad kyi srung ma britstshi ka zhes bya ba /
translated: In front of them, draw or imagine the protector of all times named Bṛcaka.

original: lus lcags kyi sdig pa chen po rva dang yan lag dang mjug ma rnams kyang gnam lcags 'bar ba las grub pa rno ba gdug pa sa thams cad bdag gir byed cing srung ba zhig yi ger bris la bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: lus lcags kyi sdig pa chen po rva dang yan lag dang mjug ma rnams kyang gnam lcags 'bar ba las grub pa rno ba gdug pa sa thams cad bdag gir byed cing srung ba zhig yi ger bris la bsam par bya'o //
translated: His body is a great iron ram, and his horns, limbs, and tail are all made of blazing meteoric iron. He is sharp and fierce, and he protects by taking possession of all places.

original: de nas bdag gi ye shes kyi 'od zer 'og gi phyogs su 'phros pas /
analyzed: de nas bdag gi ye shes kyi 'od zer 'og gi phyogs su 'phros pas /
translated: Then, light rays of awareness radiate from oneself in the lower direction.

original: 'og gi phyogs nas sa'i bdag po rnams ji ltar bsams pa de 'dra ba spyan drangs par bsam zhing /
analyzed: 'og gi phyogs nas sa'i bdag po rnams ji ltar bsams pa de 'dra ba spyan drangs par bsam zhing /
translated: Imagine that the lords of the ground in the lower direction are invoked in a form like that.

original: aom bhu aa dhi pa ti ma h'a b'a r'a h'a padma m'a li ni tsa a'a karsha ya dza: h'um bam ho:/🔽zhes brjod cing /
analyzed: aom bhu aa dhi pa ti ma h'a b'a r'a h'a padma m'a li ni tsa a'a karsha ya dza: h'um bam ho:/ zhes brjod cing /
translated: Say oṃ bhūḥ aḍipadma mahāvarāha padmāmalinī cākarṣaya jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.

original: lcags kyu'am bum pa'i phyag brgya bcas te spyan drangs pas /
analyzed: lcags kyu'am bum pa'i phyag brgya bcas te spyan drangs pas /
translated: Say that and invoke with the mudra of the iron hook or the vase.

original: sngar bskyed pa dang gnyis su med par 'gyur bar bsam mo //
analyzed: sngar bskyed pa dang gnyis su med par 'gyur bar bsam mo //
translated: Imagine that they become non-dual with the previously generated [deity].

original: de nas aargha la sogs pa mchod pa'i rdzas rnams la bum pa'i phyag rgyas bzung ste /
analyzed: de nas aargha la sogs pa mchod pa'i rdzas rnams la bum pa'i phyag rgyas bzung ste /
translated: Then, holding the offering substances such as the argha with the vase mudra,

original: gsang sngags gong ma nyid las /
analyzed: gsang sngags gong ma nyid las /
translated: [recite] the above mantra

original: a'a karsha ya /
analyzed: a'a karsha ya /
translated: and add ākarṣaya🔽to the end of the mantra.🔽Then,

original: la sogs pa'i gnas su ma h'a p'u dza me gha sa ma ye sv'a h'a /🔽zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bar bya'o //
analyzed: la sogs pa'i gnas su ma h'a p'u dza me gha sa ma ye sv'a h'a / zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyis bskul bar bya'o //
translated: add mahāpūja megha samayas tvam.

original: de ltar mchod pas bum pa de nyid rin po che gter gyi sa gzhi chen po la /
analyzed: de ltar mchod pas bum pa de nyid rin po che gter gyi sa gzhi chen po la /
translated: Thus, by this offering, imagine that the vase itself is a great treasure ground of jewels

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan sna tshogs kyis phun sum tshogs par ldan pa'i gnas na /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan sna tshogs kyis phun sum tshogs par ldan pa'i gnas na /
translated: endowed with an abundance of various desirable qualities,

original: sa'i bdag po rnams shin tu longs spyod par bsam mo //
analyzed: sa'i bdag po rnams shin tu longs spyod par bsam mo //
translated: where the lords of the earth enjoy themselves.

original: 'di ltar zhag gsum mam lnga 'am bdun gyi bar du byas na de nas bum pa dang sdig pa'i gzugs su bcas pa de nas blangs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar zhag gsum mam lnga 'am bdun gyi bar du byas na de nas bum pa dang sdig pa'i gzugs su bcas pa de nas blangs te /
translated: If one performs this for three, five, or seven days, then take out the vase together with the form of the negative action.

original: sngon gyi bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan dang bcas pa khyer nas /
analyzed: sngon gyi bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan dang bcas pa khyer nas /
translated: Carrying it together with the previous effigy of the one to be accomplished,

original: sa bdag ma rungs pa yod pa'i gnas shig tu ngong  ring po brus te /
analyzed: sa bdag ma rungs pa yod pa'i gnas shig tu ngong  ring po brus te /
translated: In a place where there is a harmful nāga, dig a deep pit.

original: dang por bum pa bcug la bum pa dang mnyam po tsam du sas legs par dgang bar bya'o //
analyzed: dang por bum pa bcug la bum pa dang mnyam po tsam du sas legs par dgang bar bya'o //
translated: First, place the vase. Fill it up with earth so that it is level with the vase.

original: de'i steng du sdig pa'i gzugs bsgrub bya'i @21b yul phyogs su kha bstan te bzhag la /
analyzed: de'i steng du sdig pa'i gzugs bsgrub bya'i @21b yul phyogs su kha bstan te bzhag la /
translated: On top of that, make the form of the nāga. Place it facing the direction of the victim.

original: de'i rva bar du bsgrub bya mkhar dang bcas pa bcug nas /
analyzed: de'i rva bar du bsgrub bya mkhar dang bcas pa bcug nas /
translated: In the middle of its belly, place the victim together with the house.

original: bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i tshon skud rnams sdig pa'i khar bcug ste gzhag go //
analyzed: bsgrub bya'i lte ba'i tshon skud rnams sdig pa'i khar bcug ste gzhag go //
translated: Place the victim’s navel string in the mouth of the nāga.

original: de'i bar du bsgrub bya'i pha dang ma dang mes po la sogs pa rnams kyi ming dang rus pa la sogs pa rnyed kyang rung /
analyzed: de'i bar du bsgrub bya'i pha dang ma dang mes po la sogs pa rnams kyi ming dang rus pa la sogs pa rnyed kyang rung /
translated: In the middle of that, place the names and clans of the victim’s father, mother, grandfather, and so on, if they are found.

original: de dag ras kyi nang du dril te /
analyzed: de dag ras kyi nang du dril te /
translated: Wrap them in cloth.

original: che ge mo rnams kyi gnas rtag tu 'dir 'cha' ba yin no zhes bya ba'i yi ge yang bris la de dag de'i rva bar du lhan cig tu bcug ste /
analyzed: che ge mo rnams kyi gnas rtag tu 'dir 'cha' ba yin no zhes bya ba'i yi ge yang bris la de dag de'i rva bar du lhan cig tu bcug ste /
translated: Write the words, “So-and-so’s dwelling is always here,” and place them together in the middle of the nāga’s belly.

original: legs par sbas te gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: legs par sbas te gzhag par bya'o //
translated: Conceal it well and place it there.

original: de nas rang gis khyim du 'ongs te srog chags skye bas thob pa'i nang mi mthun pa gnyis kyi gzugs kha sprod du bris te /
analyzed: de nas rang gis khyim du 'ongs te srog chags skye bas thob pa'i nang mi mthun pa gnyis kyi gzugs kha sprod du bris te /
translated: Then, having returned home, one should draw two opposing forms of the family members of the being to be killed, who are hostile to each other, and

original: de'i bar du thab khung gcan gzan khro bo'i kha 'dra ba byas nas /
analyzed: de'i bar du thab khung gcan gzan khro bo'i kha 'dra ba byas nas /
translated: between them one should make a hearth like the mouth of a fierce beast.

original: de'i nang du shing rtsub pa brdzangs te mi nang mi mthun pa gnyis kyi khyim nas me blangs nas /
analyzed: de'i nang du shing rtsub pa brdzangs te mi nang mi mthun pa gnyis kyi khyim nas me blangs nas /
translated: Having put rough wood into it, one should take fire from the house of two people who are hostile to each other,

original: srog chags skye bas thob pa'i nang mi mthun pa rnams kyi sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang / spu dang pags pa rnams la rtsa ba'i sngags bskul ba dang bcas pa bzlas shing spyin sreg byas na /
analyzed: srog chags skye bas thob pa'i nang mi mthun pa rnams kyi sha dang khrag dang rus pa dang / spu dang pags pa rnams la rtsa ba'i sngags bskul ba dang bcas pa bzlas shing spyin sreg byas na /
translated: and having recited the root mantra together with the urging, one should make a burnt offering of the flesh, blood, bones, hair, and skin of the family members of the being to be killed, who are hostile to each other.

original: snying stobs can kha cig gis zhag bdun rjes su bskul bas bsgrub bya sa'i bdag pos gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snying stobs can kha cig gis zhag bdun rjes su bskul bas bsgrub bya sa'i bdag pos gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Some who are courageous will, after seven days of urging, be seized by the lord of the earth of the victim.

original: tha ma yang zla ba drug rjes su bskul ba byas pa sa de bzhin du gzung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha ma yang zla ba drug rjes su bskul ba byas pa sa de bzhin du gzung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Even the least will, after six months of urging, be seized in the same way.

original: de la bskul ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la bskul ba'i sngags ni 'di yin te /
translated: The mantra for urging is this:

original: che ge mo dang sa bdag rnams de sha ya dzu da ya phat ces bya ba 'di rtsa ba'i sngags kyi rjes su bskul bas /
analyzed: che ge mo dang sa bdag rnams de sha ya dzu da ya phat ces bya ba 'di rtsa ba'i sngags kyi rjes su bskul bas /
translated: shaya juya phat, after the root mantra,

original: de dag shin tu 'khrug pas 'thab par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag shin tu 'khrug pas 'thab par bsam par bya'o //
translated: one should imagine that they are very agitated and fighting.

original: sbu gu rig par bya ba zhes bya ba'i cho ga las /
analyzed: sbu gu rig par bya ba zhes bya ba'i cho ga las /
translated: From the ritual of the knowledge of the tube,

original: bsgrub bya sa'i bdag pos zin par bya ba zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba bstan pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: bsgrub bya sa'i bdag pos zin par bya ba zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba bstan pa rdzogs so /
translated: the teaching of the application of the one to be subdued by the lord of the earth is complete.

original: // / da ni sbu gu rig par bya ba'i cho ga las /
analyzed: // / da ni sbu gu rig par bya ba'i cho ga las /
translated: Now, from the ritual of the knowledge of the tube,

original: bsgrub bya ma mo'i gdon gyis zin par bya ba'i sbyor ba bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: bsgrub bya ma mo'i gdon gyis zin par bya ba'i sbyor ba bshad par bya ste /
translated: I will explain the application of the one to be subdued by the possession of the ghost of a female spirit.

original: dang po nyid du gang yang rung ba'i gnas su rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms nas rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod byed cing sems brtan par gyur par bya'o //
analyzed: dang po nyid du gang yang rung ba'i gnas su rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bsgoms nas rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bzlas brjod byed cing sems brtan par gyur par bya'o //
translated: First, in any suitable place, having meditated on the vajra maṇḍala just as it is, one should recite the root mantra and stabilize the mind.

original: de nas ma mo'i gnas su song nas /
analyzed: de nas ma mo'i gnas su song nas /
translated: Then, having gone to the abode of the female spirit,

original: thab khung zla gam du shing dmar po la me spar te rdzas kha dog dmar po rnams kyis nyi ma re re spyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
analyzed: thab khung zla gam du shing dmar po la me spar te rdzas kha dog dmar po rnams kyis nyi ma re re spyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad bya'o //
translated: In a triangular hearth, having lit a fire with red wood, one should make one hundred and eight burnt offerings each day with substances of red color.

original: de ltar nyi ma brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du byas nas /
analyzed: de ltar nyi ma brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du byas nas /
translated: Having done this for one hundred and eight days,

original: de nas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan snga ma bzhin du @22a * //
analyzed: de nas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan snga ma bzhin du @22a * //
translated: then, having made the effigy of the victim as before,

original: byas te / gro ga 'am shog shog la bud med kyi gzugs khros pa /
analyzed: byas te / gro ga 'am shog shog la bud med kyi gzugs khros pa /
translated: on birch bark or paper one should make four images of women,

original: kha dog dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / nag po dang bzhi byas la lte ba'i tshon skud dang / kha dog mthun par gu gul gyis bud med kyi kha dang sbyar te gzhag go //
analyzed: kha dog dkar po dang / dmar po dang / ser po dang / nag po dang bzhi byas la lte ba'i tshon skud dang / kha dog mthun par gu gul gyis bud med kyi kha dang sbyar te gzhag go //
translated: angry, white, red, yellow, and black, and having tied them with a thread at the navel, one should place them together with gugul and the blood of a woman.

original: de nas bud med kyi thod pa bkra mi shis pa zhig gi nang du bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan bcug ste /
analyzed: de nas bud med kyi thod pa bkra mi shis pa zhig gi nang du bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan bcug ste /
translated: Then, having placed the effigy of the victim inside an inauspicious skull of a woman,

original: de'i steng nas bud med kyi gzugs brnyan bzhag nas /
analyzed: de'i steng nas bud med kyi gzugs brnyan bzhag nas /
translated: having placed the image of the woman on top of that,

original: dug sna tshogs dang khrag kyang blugs par bya'o //
analyzed: dug sna tshogs dang khrag kyang blugs par bya'o //
translated: one should pour various poisons and blood.

original: skye tshe 'am yungs kar nag la rtsa ba'i sngags bskul ba dang bcas pa ci nus bzlas te yang blugs par bya'o //
